channel.title: Adding command to your server
channel.description: How to add commands like ::puregear, ::hybird, ::dh, ::pots, ::veng.... The server type is PI

item.title: Adding command to your server
item.dc:creator: @begineer begineer
item.description:
@begineer wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("vengfight") && c.playerRights >= 2) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.getItems().addItem(391, 19); c.getItems().addItem(2436, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2440, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2442, 1); c.getItems().addItem(557, 5000); c.getItems().addItem(560, 5000); c.getItems().addItem(9075, 5000); c.getItems().addItem(3024, 3);

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("rares") && c.playerRights == 3) { c.getItems().addItem(1038, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1040, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1042, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1044, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1046, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1048, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1050, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1053, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1055, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1057, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11694, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11696, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11698, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11700, 1); }

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“brid”) && c.playerRights >= 2) {
int[] equip = { 10828, 2414, 6585, 15050, 4712, 15021, -1, 4714, -1,
7462, 6920, -1, 6737};
for (int i = 0; i < equip.length; i++) {
c.playerEquipment[i] = equip[i];
c.playerEquipmentN[i] = 1;
c.getItems().setEquipment(equip[i], 1, i);
}

			c.getItems().addItem(11724, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(4736, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2440, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(11726, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(11283, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(6685, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(2436, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(391, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(3024, 3);
			c.getItems().addItem(391, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(391, 7);
			c.getItems().addItem(5698, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(560, 5000);			
			c.getItems().addItem(391, 4);
			c.getItems().addItem(565, 5000);
			c.getItems().addItem(555, 5000);
			c.playerMagicBook = 1;
			c.getItems().resetItems(3214);
			c.getItems().resetBonus();
			c.getItems().getBonus();
			c.getItems().writeBonus();
	}[/code]

Hope this helps

item.title: Adding command to your server
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

No-one intends to do it for you, but here’s an example;

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("veng")) { c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, QUANTITY); c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, QUANTITY); c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, QUANTITY); c.sendMessage("XXXX"); }

Read full topic
